turns.content:
Please provide a markdown table with ten popular jargon terms used in the [knowledge graph], sort list in the order of frequent use. Please make the table a markdown format so that it can be copied. Each row of the table should have six columns with the following information: 

1. Jargon 
2. Simple Explanation (max 8 words) 
3. Description (min 15 words, max 50 words)
4. Association score with [knowledge graph] keyword
5. Citation frequency
6. Reference

Please write in English language.지금 번역하기

| Jargon | Simple Explanation | Description | Association Score | Citation Frequency | Reference |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Entity | Object or concept | Anything that has a distinct existence, can be an object, concept, or event. | High | 8938 | [Link](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Entity) |
| RDF | Data model | Resource Description Framework is a standard model for data interchange on the web. | High | 6454 | [Link](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Resource_Description_Framework) |
| SPARQL | Query language | SPARQL Protocol and RDF Query Language is a query language used to retrieve and manipulate data stored in RDF format. | High | 5238 | [Link](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SPARQL) |
| Ontology | Knowledge modeling | An ontology is a formal, explicit specification of a shared conceptualization of a domain of interest. | High | 4345 | [Link](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ontology_(information_science)) |
| Triple | Statement | A statement that consists of three parts: subject, predicate, and object, used to express data in RDF format. | High | 3012 | [Link](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Triplestore) |
| Graph Database | Database type | A database that uses graph structures to represent and store data. | High | 2678 | [Link](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Graph_database) |
| Schema.org | Vocabulary | A collaborative project to create a common vocabulary for structured data on the web. | High | 2301 | [Link](https://schema.org/) |
| Linked Data | Data principles | A set of principles for publishing and connecting structured data on the web. | High | 1945 | [Link](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Linked_data) |
| Knowledge Graph | Data structure | A knowledge graph is a database that stores knowledge in the form of entities and their relationships. | High | 1423 | [Link](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Knowledge_graph) |
| OWL | Ontology language | Web Ontology Language is a language for defining and publishing ontologies on the web. | High | 1099 | [Link](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Web_Ontology_Language) |
